item.title: Andrew Garfield's The Amazing Spider-Man 3 Gets Daredevil: Born Again Poster Treatment With Tom Hardy's Venom
item.description: A new The Amazing Spider-Man 3 poster, in the style of Daredevil: Born Again brings Andrew Garfield's web-slinger against Tom Hardy's Venom.

item.title: Jon Hamm's Star-Studded Comedy With 20% Rotten Tomatoes Score Climbs Streaming Chart 9 Years Later
item.description: Jon Hamm may be best known for his TV roles in elite shows like Mad Men, but its his 2016 comedy that is currently doing well on a streaming service.
